committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service
House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: To amend title 13, United States Code, to require that the population characteristics reflected in interim data collected by the Secretary of Commerce between decennial censuses include data relating to urban, rural, below-poverty, and farming populations.

summary.text: Requires that the population characteristics reflected in interim data collected by the Secretary of Commerce between decennial censuses include data relating to urban, rural, below-poverty, and farming populations.

titles.title: To amend title 13, United States Code, to require that the population characteristics reflected in interim data collected by the Secretary of Commerce between decennial censuses include data relating to urban, rural, below-poverty, and farming populations.
